content.rendered:
Ryboa Haima has been honored with the OXY HSE Award for 2024 in the Innovation for Safety category, recognizing its groundbreaking efforts in enhancing workplace safety through innovative solutions. This prestigious award highlights the company’s commitment to developing and implementing cutting-edge safety measures that go beyond industry standards. By integrating advanced technologies, proactive risk management strategies, and a strong safety culture, Ryboa Haima continues to set new benchmarks in ensuring the well-being of its workforce and the integrity of its operations.

This recognition underscores Ryboa Haima’s dedication to continuous improvement and forward-thinking approaches to safety. The company remains committed to investing in innovative safety solutions that not only protect its employees but also contribute to a more sustainable and efficient work environment. Winning the OXY HSE Award for Innovation for Safety further solidifies Ryboa Haima’s reputation as a leader in HSE excellence, reinforcing its mission to drive industry-wide advancements in health, safety, and environmental performance.
